features: Comprehensive Set: This set includes a range of essential knives for versatile cooking tasks, such as an 8" chef knife, 8" slicing knife, 8" bread knife, 7" Santoku knife, 6.5" serrated utility knife, and a 3.5" paring knife.
High-Quality Stainless Steel Blades: Enjoy the precision and durability of high-quality stainless steel blades that ensure long-lasting performance and effortless slicing.
3) Nonstick Coating: Each knife in the set features a nonstick coating, making slicing and chopping easier while preventing food from sticking to the blade.
Blade Guards Included: For added safety and protection, each knife comes with a matching blade guard. This helps keep the blades sharp and your fingers safe during storage

Versatility and Convenience: With a variety of knife sizes and types, this set offers versatility for various cutting tasks in the kitchen. The combination of high-quality blades, nonstick coating, and included blade guards makes this set a convenient choice for any home cook.
body.description: Cuisinart advantage professional-quality stainless steel knives have a cutting-edge, nonstick coating that makes slicing easier - and allows Color coding during food prep to avoid cross-contamination. In style-conscious hues for today's design-smart consumer, these premium knives come with matching blade guards and ergonomic handles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Turning The Art Of Great Cooking Into An American Lifestyle Julia Child let people in on the Cuisinart secret and so did James Beard. They were among the first culinary experts to hail the food processor as a revolutionary kitchen appliance when it was introduced to America in 1973 by the late Cuisinart founder, Carl Sontheimer. They saw the food processor as a quick and easy way to make fine food and healthy dishes. Our Mission is to help you “Savor the Good Life.” Under management from Conair Corporation since 1989, the legacy is alive and well, as today, Cuisinart is a universally recognized name. The prestigious Cuisinart brand is not limited to food processors. Plugged or unplugged, nobody covers the kitchen like Cuisinart. The company is a full-service culinary resource with a wide array of products, preferred by chefs and favored by consumers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are really good knives for the price and the set itself. I use them all the time and one of my cook. Friends really likes them as well. I might get us up for themselves. They are very easy to handle into use for people who aren’t professionals, but still like to do a lot of cooking. Do you knives stay Sharp for a long period of time and also easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good looking set of knives. Comes with sturdy covers. Heavy duty
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and the covers are too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Knives
reviews.reviewText: Good knives....very sharp....good price....like the covers.......but as others have said be careful when washing or if they get wet while using.....handles are smooth and become slippery.....have gotten myself a few times with the paring knife....but would still buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: I love these knives. I got them as a gift in college and they still work great! I recently gave them as a gift and they have been a hit. They are easy to clean (I hand wash), and stay sharp. They are easy to hold and have really nice covers that stay on without being too tight/wearing down the blade. I love the different color options. I have the ones that are all different colors which helps my brain grab the right knife when I'm in a rush. I think Cuisinart is a great brand I'll be buying from for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These knives ae very easy to hold
reviews.reviewText: There is nothing I dislike about these knives. They are beautiful, extremely sharp, they fit my old arithritic hands very well and are easy to hold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and with a lifetime warranty!
reviews.reviewText: My goodness do these affordable knives cut nicely. The sheath on each protect the blade during storage. They would be a really nice gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Cutlery Set I Have Owned
reviews.reviewText: Sharp, beautiful, stylish, what more could one ask for in cutlery.I am particularly fond of these because I use a caddy for all my kitchen utensils, I prefer these knives because each one has their own individual plastic cover
exelente que vengan con proteccion, mantiene su estado fisico de la mejor manera
I love these knives. They are sharp and easy to handle. A knife for every purpose. Highly recommended.
Love this knife set. Easy to hold

Estoy felíz con mis cuchillos!! el color está super, y tienen muy bonito brillo, el filo es excelente, y no están pesados; vienen con su cubierta cada uno, para transportarlos es excelente aunque para guardalos yo preferí sin la cubierta.
